house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1956 has 6 bedroom(s), 6 bath(s) and approximately 6442 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Esslinger-Wooten-M Esslinger-Wooten-M Lic. Real Estate Broker

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, Outdoor Lights, Skylights, Trash Compacter,Walk-In Closet(s)
